import React from 'react' import Product from '../components/Product' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import data from '../data' export default function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.product.find((x) => x._id === props.matach.params.id) if (!product) { return
Product Not Found
} return (

  • {product.image}

  • Price : {product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    {product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Unavailable )}
) }
